title: Trend, policy on population growth in China, Iran

content.question: Population growth rate is defined as the average annual percent change in the population resulting from a surplus or deficit of births over deaths. Describe one trend shown in the graph for Iran and describe one trend shown in the graph for China. Explain one policy Iran has used to address population growth issues. Explain one policy China has used to address population growth issues. Explain why both Iran and China pursued population growth policies. Describe one social or economic consequence of manipulating population growth rates.

frqParts.text: Population growth rate is defined as the average annual percent change in the population resulting from a surplus or deficit of births over deaths. unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
